propositions.text: The document is titled "太平 (出书版)".
The main section is titled "太平".
Within the main section, there is a sub-section titled "太平（出书版）".
The sub-section "太平（出书版）" is repeated multiple times.

concepts.name: 太平
concepts.context: Appears as the main title, main section title, and sub-section title.

concepts.name: 出书版
concepts.context: Appears as part of the main title and sub-section titles.

hierarchy.structure: The document has a main title, followed by a main section, which contains a repeated sub-section.
